typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		policyId as string,
		submissionId as string,
		documents as (document as string, documentContext as string, referenceDocumentId as string, submissions as (submissionsVersion as string, parties as (status as string, partyId as string, policyRole as string, updateTime as string, IPAddress as string)[])[], policies as (policyTerm as string, parties as (status as string, partyId as string, policyRole as string, updateTime as string, IPAddress as string)[])[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		{_id} as string,
		partyId as string,
		updateTime as string,
		IPAddress as string,
		documentContext as string,
		document as string,
		submissionId as string,
		submissionVersion as string,
		policyId as string,
		referenceDocumenId as string,
		status as string,
		policyRole as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sink1
